data.message: The movie was really tragickly  great , jake is so dynamically versatile as an actor . Digged him since way back with Donnie the Darko . He should have played spider man in my opinion whoever chose tobey was probly tobey's boyf . ... Anyway now about the music , yes M you keeeled it man ... Loved "phenomenal"  some dumbfucks was saying on YouTube you don't talk sense no more ... I'm thinking what bathsalts was those weird dudes on , you only just teaching someone to be phenominal , nothing much .... Anyway "Kings Neva Die " also the bomb-track ... Gwen was the dead right one for that .. Was that track a bit of a dig a RA the rugged on one level ? Mr YouTube yet anti media ... Maybe I'm just being nasty here . Anyway well done guys ANOTHER succes , damn some mthrfckrs just got the Midas touch ;)

replies.message: Seriously people saying that Eminem talks nonsense now is irritating the fuck outta me. He is wayy more sarcastic and subliminal than he used to be and well you just gotta have a brain to understand him

Patrick Bytyqi yes that's exactly it , the punchlines are generally more thought provoking, the emotions are more complex....and the flows I actually prefer them. The music just seems to have more feeling to it.

I'd let you see my dark side but like a Mic check you got one two. 
Fuckin savage Eminem.

" So when the sparks fly, we hit the flight deck and got sprung, pew
Like an ejector seat, from an F-15
But tonight we don't need those pills, just the effects of each other
But we gon' film cause I will want your ex to see"

And the wordplay at ex to see it sounded like he was saying ecstasy. People say Em doesn't rap like before and he's trash now and some even say that Eminem would've ruined the new D12 Mixtape. Are you effin' kidding me. Em doesn't rap like before but he is still that MC we all know.
yea exacto .... He's upped his game, once you get touched by death shit aint the same .. Ruined the D12 mixtape.. Na more like would put it on the radar
